title: Petz415
author: Petz415
content: Do you have any recommendations? One of my favourites is the "The Book of Satoshi" by Phil Champagne, I'm a big fan of Bitcoin and other crypto non-fiction books, I'm surprised an biography of Hal Finney hasn't been written yet, unless any of you know of any? I've recently taken up running again, I was inspired by the "running bitcoin" Hal's wife set up, but was really out of shape to participate at the time.
